branchCategory.name: C(D)S1W*H, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod (Air-Hydro)
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CS1 low pressure air/hydro, double rod, double acting version of SMC's largest bore cylinder. This series is available in bore sizes up to 160mm and stroke lengths up to 800mm. Additionally, the CS1 can be ordered auto-switch capable. Other options include, various mounting configurations, cushion for noise damping.</p>
